about_the_game:
Sign-up for Alpha

Sign up for alpha access here, only a few people will be selected for the initial testing phase.
Join the discord and get involved with the development process here.

Heroes Raid

Immerse yourself in a dark, dystopian world that seamlessly blends angels, demons, firearms, swordsmanship, magic, formidable creatures, and advanced technology. Progress through diverse, ever-evolving storylines, embarking solo or with your allies. As you level up, gather loot, earn rewards, and bolster your power by summoning even greater forces. Experience unique and dynamic narrative as you unravel the story, while dungeon raids are generated procedurally, ensuring a one-of-a-kind experience each time.

Enhance

Additionally, enhance your arsenal by summoning powerful equipment, unlocking new abilities and customizing your squad's tactics. The AI of your squad can be set to employ specific strategies, further immersing you in the game's intense battles. Upgrade and master the abilities you acquire from equipment, elevating your gameplay and allowing you to tackle even greater challenges. With this seamless integration of equipment, abilities, and AI tactics, you'll be fully equipped to tackle any obstacle in your path. Maximize your strength by sacrificing summoned heroes to transfer their abilities to other characters. Craft the ultimate build, from a lightning-fast assassin to a magic-wielding archer.


Act 1

Enter a dream, the stage is set atop a towering city, gazing down at the rain-soaked streets below. Suddenly, an event unfolds, bringing chaos and peril. But all is not lost, as an otherworldly force intervenes, hinting at a greater purpose yet to be revealed.

Wake up on a train, only to be taken into custody by armed soldiers. With cunning and skill, fight your way out of danger and journey back to the city. Use this opportunity to master the gameplay mechanics and familiarize yourself with the world. Seek refuge in a club near the docks, where you encounter a fiery ally in a dramatic cutscene. Together, embark on a mission to reunite with missing companions and uncover the secrets of this hauntingly beautiful, yet dangerous world.

Team or Solo PvP Arena

Take a break from the story and prove your dominance in PvP modes, including 4v4, 3v3, 2v2, and 1v1, with ladders, fame and rewards on offer.
